title: Does Pixel 3 support 1080p 60FPS?
content:
Hi there,

I cannot find answer in Google Search (only very old answers saying - not)

I know third party apps support it but I want to use GCam.

I know newer Pixel 4 had same problem with 4K 60FPS but in GCam 8.1 Google resolved that - the reason I ask now.

I have latest GCam 8.1, latest March 2021 updates.

In GCam Settings I got 1080p 30FPS and....... "Auto" which does NOT  say anything is it 15FPS?

I can understand Pixel 3 will not support 4K 60FPS  BUT - is 1080p 60FPS is it such a big big problem?
